column1: Traffic reports will resume Wednesday May 29 at 4:00 p.m.

column4: The roadway is shut down to thru traffic in both directions between Kearney Ridge Blvd and Berea Rd.
Police continue working a collision reportedly involving a semi, a wrecker, and a motorcyclist.
Estimated duration until 4 p.m.  Motorists traveling between Georgetown and Lexington will need to seek an alternate route.
